p: Following RNA extraction as reported above, the NS5b and NS3 regions were sequenced for HCV genotyping. Ten microliters of extracted viral RNA were used for reverse transcription with Transcriptor Reverse Transcriptase (Roche) and random primers (Roche). For amplifying the NS5b region (374 nucleotides, H77: 8256–8630), 1,1X Platinum PCR SuperMix (Life Technologies) and previously published primers were used [ 17]. Different sets of primers, specifically designed for genotype 1, 2, 3a, 3b and 4 and 1,1X Platinum PCR SuperMix (Life Technologies) were used to amplify the first part of the NS3 gene (710 nucleotides, H77:3326–4036) [ 18].
